summary: Ideal mod for a new game. Adds new locations, a hidden quest and things for you to just discover. Everything is hidden from the map so no fast traveling or quest markers to ruin the feeling of discovery. So pack your gear and start adventuring!
descriptionHtml:
I'll add more stuff into this later, suggestions are welcome!

Contents:

This mod adds a number of things and places for you to discover while adventuring. Small things can be found all over the world by exploring the reaches many dont travel. Also adds few things to existing interiors. Few treasure hunts, a hidden quest and lots of things where you yourself can imagine what'd happened.


Installing:

Use NMM or extract the data file to Skyrim Data folder.


Compatibility:

Should work with pretty much everything as I quite frankly do not have the skill to do anything game-breaking.
Only problems should be if some other mod adds things to the same place as I have done, but this is unlikely as I chose some very weird places for my additions. But should problems arise, leave a message!
author: ankkamus
